adHeader: Guitar and Bass Fretboard Workshop: Scales, Solos, Theory & Modes Made
adDetails: These private guitar & bass lessons are designed for beginner-advanced players interested in "unlocking the fretboard" & "seeing all the options" we have. Some people know a few pentatonic scales. Some people know a few major scales. Some people are mislead to think that you need to learn to read music/be classically trained to learn scales. That's not the case, especially in context of playing modern music. (as opposed to classical) Many, many resources and people/teachers seem to teach the fretboard poorly. Playing "scale x @ fret y" and mastering pentatonic +maj/min +modes is not as hard as it seems. I emphasize an all-visual system. You'll never have to learn each scale as an autonomous concept. It's something I teach a lot and teach efficiently. I teach general guitar as well if you want to "do playing stuff" while we work on scales.... very flexible. I am available Mon-Sat. I have a BA in music composition, performance and production. This has been my "day job"/vocation for about 10 years and I love it. Lessons are available @ my studio or on Skype/online. I'm used to being a guitar/bass "psychologist" as needed... help with practice habits, performance anxiety/on the spot, not falling into the same patterns, mental blocks. Wherever you're @ we'll play fill in the blanks and address "bad habits" that come up in the process. Thanks so much for your time.
